bona nobona eka thamage pudgalika deyak.eekata mama mukuth kiyanne naha.eeth ee waden apita kisima prayojanayak naththam karala wadak naha.mata bona yaluwo godak innawa.ee hamoma kiyanne ada nawaththanawa,heta nawaththanawa kiyala,eeth ada wenakan nawaththapu kenek naha.mathata thitha kiyala rata pura kiwuwata mathdrawyaya hariyakarayen palanayak siduwanne naha.hamathanama bar.poya dawasatath kisi prashnayak nathuwa badu hoyaganna puluwan.polisiya allanneth kasippu baral ekak hari ra muttiyak.eetawada monawahari kaloth sorimathama.ma danna paridi rajayata wadiyenma badu gewana aayathanaya wenne lanka dumkola samagamayi.bona eka(mathpan,dumwati ) sambandhayen oyalage adahasa mokadda ??
